rules_text:
Trample
Creature spells you cast have delve.
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Eust, Seaward Savior.
rules_text2:
Prowess
Instant and sorcery spells you cast have delve.
Whenever one or more instant and/ or sorcery cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
